events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving their vehicle and another on the highway, requesting immediate assistance.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after analyzing the details mentioning vehicle collision.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned promptly to assist the customer with their vehicle accident.
Customer received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is under review.
Request sent to the customer for the accident police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and contact details of other parties.
Customer submitted all required documents including police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and witness statements.
Investigation was initiated based on submitted documents to assess liability and extent of vehicle damage.
Investigation concluded, confirming the accident was due to another driver's negligence causing damage to the insured car.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs and rental car expenses during the vehicle fix.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and appreciated the responsiveness of the insurance team.
Approval for the auto accident claim was granted based on investigation results and customer acceptance of settlement.
Insurance payment was issued to the customerâ€™s repair shop and rental car agency to cover approved expenses.
The auto accident claim was successfully closed following full payment and confirmation of vehicle repair completion.
All claim records and documentation were archived for future reference in compliance with regulatory standards.
